aboutUs.title: Who We Are
aboutUs.description1: We are Shoot Ang. We have a long history in establishing startups and digital marketing and media for over 150 brands. We have faced the challenges related to client projects and achieved significant numbers and results in our digital transformation journey. We have left our unique and initial mark in the market, through which we were able to
aboutUs.description2: in a different way and competitive quality to support Saudi products, making it easier for us to market the product according to the standards of success and manufacturing, avoiding duplicated projects and product replication.

services_2.title: Our Services
services_2.description_1: We offer a range of services to help you achieve your business goals.
services_2.description_2: Our team is dedicated to providing high-quality solutions tailored to your needs.
services_2.highlight_brand: Establish and highlight the brand identity to distinguish emerging companies and showcase their essence through a set of values, characteristics, and symbols that can give them a distinctive position in competition with other companies.
services_2.start_project: We start your project by entering our operating rooms, which are our special place consisting of several studio shoot rooms - the idea incubation room and the content room - and a team meeting room. From here, the project begins with artistic creativity.

ourProjects.contentRight: We have our old history that plays an important role in leaving an impact on the minds of your customers

industry.title: Industry
industry.description1: Shot Ing is distinguished as the first agency that supports the product from industry to marketing, as it uses its first weapon, which is content marketing. The quality of the product is its primary goal, upon which the successful marketing strategy is built.
industry.description2: Due to Shot Ing's experience in the industry and quality standards, it helps upcoming project owners by adjusting quality standards and choosing new crafts that can provide them with the best industrial values, supported by delving into the fine details to the quality and professionalism of the external appearance.

welcome.message: Our approach is a language, and we are its letters. With your presence, our meanings are complete.
welcome.title: Welcome, and a warm welcome to you.

department.title: Employment Department
department.description: At Shoot Ing, our employees are referred to as merchants of taste. We trade and sell taste before it becomes a product or service. We are looking for distinguished individuals with refined taste, who have both artistic talent and sufficient knowledge of market trends and creative experiences, to become our partners in this journey.

training.title: Training Department
training.description: This department is dedicated to individuals with talents and visions in the artistic and marketing fields, to join our team. The department aims to develop knowledge and skills, gaining the necessary experience to participate in the job market.

description.placeholder: Why do you want to join us?
